title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 240.5 - Use of simplified name
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 240.5 - Use of simplified name

State Regulations

No simplified legal district name may be used prior to the
date specified in the certificate to be issued by the commissioner. The board
of education, board of trustees, sole trustee or other governing body of a
school district may, prior to the effective date specified in such certificate, adopt and file with the commissioner a resolution deferring the effective date
of the simplified legal district name set forth in the certificate to a date
not more than 90 days subsequent to the date specified by the commissioner. Upon such filing, the effective date shall be deemed to be deferred to the date
specified in such resolution. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
240.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
